title: Mckenna Cooper
text:
Welcome!
This website showcases my work in Quantitative Reasoning for Ecosystem Science.
Navigate using the menu to learn more about my backgroud, projects, and references.

title: About
text: I am a fourth-year Ecosystem Science and Sustainability student at Colorado State University with a passion for building sustainable communities. In my free time, I enjoy skiing, sewing, and volunteering at a local community garden in Fort Collins. I am eager to expand my skills and explore new professional experiences, particularly in sustainability-focused project management. My goal is to contribute to initiatives that improve livelihoods and promote environmental balance through innovative and community-driven solutions. about

title: Projects
text:
During my Spring Semester of 2025, I took Quantitative Reasoning for Ecosystem Science. I learned how to utilize RStudio, GitHub, and Quarto to write code, showcase my projects for future employers, and make personalized websites. Super cool! below is the link to my github where you can see all of my current repositories. More coming soon!
https://github.com/mckenna-cooper

title: Projects
